verses.verse: Not unto us, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, not unto us, but unto thy name <S%H8034><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%>, for thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and for thy truth's <S%H571><s%> sake.
Wherefore should the heathen <S%H1471><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Where is now their God <S%H430><s%>?
But our God <S%H430><s%> is in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: he hath done <S%H6213><s%> whatsoever he hath pleased <S%H2654><s%>.
Their idols <S%H6091><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of men's <S%H120><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>.
They have mouths <S%H6310><s%>, but they speak <S%H1696><s%> not: eyes <S%H5869><s%> have they, but they see <S%H7200><s%> not:
They have ears <S%H241><s%>, but they hear <S%H8085><s%> not: noses <S%H639><s%> have they, but they smell <S%H7306><s%> not:
They have hands <S%H3027><s%>, but they handle <S%H4184><s%> not: feet <S%H7272><s%> have they, but they walk <S%H1980><s%> not: neither speak <S%H1897><s%> they through their throat <S%H1627><s%>.
They that make <S%H6213><s%> them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth <S%H982><s%> in them.
O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, trust <S%H982><s%> thou in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: he is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield <S%H4043><s%>.
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: he is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield <S%H4043><s%>.
Ye that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: he is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield <S%H4043><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath been mindful <S%H2142><s%> of us: he will bless <S%H1288><s%> us; he will bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; he will bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>.
He will bless <S%H1288><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, both small <S%H6996><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%>. and: Heb. with
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall increase <S%H3254><s%> you more and more, you and your children <S%H1121><s%>.
Ye are blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>.
The heaven <S%H8064><s%>, even the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, are the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%>: but the earth <S%H776><s%> hath he given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
The dead <S%H4191><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> not the LORD <S%H3050><s%>, neither any that go down <S%H3381><s%> into silence <S%H1745><s%>.
But we will bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%> from this time forth and for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%>.
